We help product teams achieve self sufficiency.

A boutique consultancy firm run by Didi Medina, focused on solving internal product team challenges via leadership, staffing, and design systems.

Leadership

Everyone leads, you just need to take ownership of the fact that you influence those around you for better or worse. There are no bad teams, only bad leaders.
